1: kyi lung <mistake>po//sangs</mistake> rgyas thams cad kyi <mistake>zang</mistake> dag par kun chub <mistake>pa'o//byang</mistake> chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad <mistake>gyi</mistake> dri <mistake>me</mistake> <mistake>med pa</mistake> shin <mistake>tu</mistake> yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
2: yongs <mistake>surdzogs</mistake> <mistake>pa'o// nyan</mistake> thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye <mistake>ba'o//lha</mistake> dang <mistake>mi</mistake> thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing <mistake>ngo //theg</mistake> pa chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> rab tu gnas <mistake>pa'o//byang</mistake> chub sems
3: dpa'i <mistake>spyod</mistake> pa'i 'byung khung <mistake>no//'phags</mistake> pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug <mistake>pa'o //rnam</mistake> par grol ba rnams kyi rtag <mistake>pa'o//nges</mistake> par 'byung ba'i lam gyi bskyed <mistake>pa'o// de</mistake> bzhin gshegs pa'i <mistake>gtung</mistake>
4: gi rgyun mi <mistake>'chad</mistake> <mistake>pa'o //byang</mistake> chub sems dpa' chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel <mistake>pa'o//pa</mistake> rol gyi <mistake>rgol</mistake> ba thams cad kyi tshar gcod <mistake>pa'o//mu</mistake> stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms <mistake>g'/</mistake>
5: bdud <mistake>bzhi'i</mistake> stobs <mistake>dag</mistake> dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed <mistake>pa'o//sems</mistake> can thams cad kyi yang dag par <mistake>snud</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//nges</mistake> par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i <mistake>la ma</mistake> yongs su
6: smin <mistake>pa'o//tshangs</mistake> pa'i gnas <mistake>bzhi la</mistake> gnas pa rnams kyi <mistake>ting</mistake> nge 'dzin <mistake>to// sems</mistake> rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam <mistake>grtan</mistake> <mistake>no//lus</mistake> dang ngag dang <mistake>yidi</mistake> mngon par sbyor ba rnams <mistake>yi</mistake> rnal 'byor <mistake>ro//</mistake>
7: yang <mistake>dag</mistake> par sbyor ba thams cad kyi kun du sbyor <mistake>ba dang</mistake> bral <mistake>ba'o//nyon</mistake> mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi <mistake>spong</mistake> <mistake>ba'o//sgrib</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> thams cad kyi nye bar zhi <mistake>ba'o// 'cing</mistake> ba thams cad kyi rnam <mistake>pa</mistake>
8: grol <mistake>ba'o//lhag</mistake> ma thams cad kyi thar <mistake>pa'o//sems</mistake> nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi <mistake>ba'o// 'byor</mistake> pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas <mistake>so//rgud</mistake> pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms <mistake>pa'o//nan</mistake> song gi
